name: POV - Data Privacy
description: Big Tech is in for a wake-up call. There are powerful new protocols for the internet that bring decentralization and real privacy to the masses. Developers are reclaiming the web and making it truly free and open.

name: POV - Smart Contract Proliferation
description: Smart contracts have huge advantages over traditional agreements. The tooling to create smart contracts will mimic the low/no-code movement. We will see millions of smart contracts each composible like lego pieces.
